EmailTemplate.name: Kevlar Glove Samples 100 Per Week
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® Gloves Follow-up Over 100
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in a Kevlar® glove samples.
We tried to contact you via telephone, and got your voice mail. We would like to speak with you, but if more convenient, you can simply reply to this email.
You indicated your company changes gloves more than 100 times per month. Would you please let us know approximately how often you change gloves. Is it 100-200 times per month or 200-300 per month, etc. We are trying to gauge your monthly requirements more closely.
Please let us know if you have questions.
DuPont Protection Solutions
